website_summaries.verdict: This chain wallet has some nice features and handsome styling, but it also comes with a few durability concerns that potentially affect its longevity and usefulness.
pros: Trifold design also has a zipped pocket
cons: Subpar chain clasp isn't very durable and tends to break with typical use
Cards fall out of the slots fairly easily
compartment is flimsy and prone to tearing

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy AGIN when this one is worn out inTen.
customer_reviews.text: Why a 5?? Leather is primo and soft as well. Lots of interior spaces for your Krappola. Snaps are in the right places both interior and the two that keep it shut in your pocket. I found the complaints about the chain curious. The chain is durable. Most chains that small won't pull a truck anyway. It can be improved by simply replacing the cheap wire links at each end. They will pull open with a toy truck. Replace those for a buck. Use one like the one that holds thru the wallet eye. Then ad a carabiner to hook to your belt and done. Maybe 4 bucks at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Black Shadow Man

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought my boyfriend a biker's wallet a couple of years ago because he was always losing his wallet. The chan ended up breaking and he kept asking me to try to find another one. I bought the original one in Century's so it was durable. I found this one on Amazon and thought it would be the same, however, it is not. Very cheaply made. The chain is really thin. It actually looks like a women's small purse. If you are purchasing this for a man, my advice is to keep looking. This is not the one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: PURE GENIOUS
customer_reviews.text: Yes the chain is worthless unless you want to make a necklace out of it.My sister Loves Bling so she will use it for that.Like a necklace.Very nice for that.I have a 40 year old "REAL" Biker chain that I can put on this,the thing is that the Wallet itself is off the charts.Iv'e had a Zillion wallets and whoever created this is a "Genious".I don't know how you can put so much into a wallet and it still close.And the "Smell"...is like walking into Daytona Beach and all those Leather shops.I swear when you go to Daytona you can't even smell the Atlantic Ocean over the the leather.This wallet "ROCKS" the free world.(Not my Quote).....Two(2) Super Thumbs Up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlane Valade

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet. Well made and has lots of compartments/areas for credit cards, change, and money. I did not like the chain, so replaced it with a heavier, longer one from my old wallet. However, that does not take away from my overall rating of this item. I would have replaced the chain anyway. Great product, fast shipping, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amante

customer_reviews.title: POSSIBLE BEST WALLET IN UNIVERSE
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found the ultimate wallet. It can handle pretty much everything that I had in my old wallet, but organizes everything in a much tighter way. Great design. With the snaps to fasten in closed and the chain - I stand zero chance of ever losing a wallet again, or anything falling out of my wallet. I do hard physical work, often in coveralls (longshoreman) and I also ride a motorcycle, I need the peace of mind that my wallet is secure and physically with me. I'm serious when I say I will probably never get another type of wallet. It's a great wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 year ago. Within 3 months of purchase, the chain had broken from me sitting down on a chair with my wallet in my back pocket. The chainlinks fell apart in my hands. It was a sad day. However, I was still able to use the wallet of course. I still use it to this day but the stitching which separates your paper notes is starting to fall apart too. Bit of a bummer. The price is right for how long I got out of the wallet. What if I had lost my wallet when the chain had broken. What would of been the point of a wallet and chain apart from the fashion and style? You decide!
customer_reviews.author: James Ireland

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is great! The pictures of the inside do not do ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is great! The pictures of the inside do not do this wallet justice, there is a lot of room for drivers licenses, credit cards, pictures. As well as an outside pocket that is the perfect size for a credit card. Genuine leather (love that smell) so don't be distressed when you first receive the wallet and items are a bit hard to get in and out, this will change as you break in the leather. The only thing I did not care for was the chain. The chain that comes with the wallet is pretty thin, so I changed it out.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hackenberger

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet, good quality matte black leather. Ditched the light gauge short chain for an 18" here on Amazon. Holds the few necessary cards that I carry with room for more, if needed. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KitchenMonk

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it says on the tin. Nice wallet!
customer_reviews.text: The search for a wallet I can stand was a tough one. I'm pretty picky. It has to be a good leather that doesn't spit stuff onto the floor, it has to close securely, and I need to be able to attach it to my keys. It also needs to look decent. This one ticks all the boxes. I like that the place with the cards has a snap, and there is an interior section with a zipper for stuff I really don't want falling out. This one's a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Nocera

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is precisely what I've been looking for in a wallet for years. Super fast delivery, exactly as described. My only complaint is the chain & clip were pretty flimsy, but I replaced them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Owen DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, with loads of slit-leather pockets and window pockets. Two gripes: the slit credit card pocket can't securely hold a single card, so if your wallet goes upside down it can slip out. You must put a few cards in a single slit to keep them in place. Trouble is, then you can't quickly find the one you want. Chain is sturdy but quality is just so-so. Still, it is a good value
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I do like all the extra pockets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in September 2017 and its now February 2018 and the product has held up pretty well except for the ring that is located inside the leather. It is starting to pull away from the leather. It has not been a full year yet and the product is already starting to tear it has lasted 5 months instead of 3 before starting to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the ideal secure wallet that can handle a good mix of receipts, cards, cash and coins then this could well be it. I purchased this two years ago and it have continually used it - while it clearly shows signs of wear it is still going strong. The design is genius and it is the best thought out high capacity wallet I have ever owned. When the time comes to replace it I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: The wallet arrived quickly, well packaged and as advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: The wallet arrived quickly, well packaged and as advertised. I have more peace of mind when riding my motorcycle. I've had no problem with the chain. The chain latch is a little small on my jean belt loops but I got it to attach with no problem. There are plenty of storage for ID and cards. The U.S Dollar is a little longer than the Euro which this wallet is based on so you'll have to fold your dollars slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet I have ever owned. Very good quality...soft leather. Many pockets and places to store items. Enough room to put my RGB led lighting controler (credit card size) for my motor cycle. The chain is cheap but I have a really nice $$ one all ready so that didn't matter. Great wallet will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Enoch Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The plastic windows break around the edges very easily. Otherwise would be worthy of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: BoiseBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good durable wallet
customer_reviews.text: The chain is very thin and needed to be changed out before use. Wallet quality was very impressive. Important to note all compartments are sized for European cards and money but works OK for American currency if folded. Seems like a good durable wallet. Have chemical smell upon opening but after leaving to air out over night smell dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl SC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had this less than two months and it is already starting to fall apart. The grommet that the chain attaches to has already come off and it is only a matter of time before the chain tears the leather. Poor quality construction
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: best wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: don't like the way the buttons catch when i return it to my back pocket. but i just changed the way i hold it so not a real problem. otherwise the wallet has held up very well. the weak point in most wallets like this are usually where the chain connects with the leather corner. not this one. if it ever gives out, i'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: gray byrd

customer_reviews.title: Makes my son feel more secure with the chain on his wallet
customer_reviews.text: The chain breaks easy but my son loves his changed wallets. Makes him feel more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Star Light

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. Nicely made and much nicer than expected. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Sandy from Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Small problem with credit card holder, but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Having lost a wallet (slipped out of pocket or stolen), this fits my needs. Small problem is the credit card pocket was too tight. I thought it would just wear in. Now the lining gets stuck when I pull out my MasterCard. Still a good deal. I would purchase again because it is a small inconvenience on a well designed wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Berk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wallet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband after he'd had one too many scares with nearly losing his wallet. He really likes the wallet itself, but is not crazy about the chain. It kinks up pretty easily and just doesn't look that great. As luck would have it, the chain was confiscated by security at a recent rock concert because it could've served as a "weapon." (What the heck?) So now we have order a new chain anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Piggles

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet! Plenty of space and compartments for your stuff. However the attached hardware sucks. (the reason for only 4 stars) I replaced the chain for a better one, and added 2 small titanium carabiners, and a better ring that goes thru the wallet eyehole.
customer_reviews.author: Skipdallas

customer_reviews.title: BUT IT'S A GOOD PROUCT JUST NOT MY
customer_reviews.text: A LITTLE BIGGER THAN I EXPECTED...BUT THE DOLLAR AREA IS A LITTLE THAN EXPECTED BUT IT IS ALSO A LITTLE OVERKILL ON THE SPACES IF YOUR INTO THAT BUT I THINK IT'S A LITTLE TOO BULKY...NOT SURE IF I'M GOING TO RETURN IT...BUT IT'S A GOOD PROUCT JUST NOT MY TASTE
customer_reviews.author: cess

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep up with your wallet
customer_reviews.text: This has served its purpose well. My adult son kept losing his i.d. and his wallet. This has worked great and he is still wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: suzn

customer_reviews.title: You wil not want another men's wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of men's wallets. Especially yhr chined biker wallets. I finally found the best one with this, so much i own a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Almodovar

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of leaving my wallet on top of counters. This wallet took care of it. The wallet is well made, nice leather, Lots of compartments, chain is long enough to put the wallet on the counter without undoing it, chain is strong, got it caught on a door knob, didn't brake. Now instead of leaving the chain hanging out I but it in my wallet. Buy it,
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a TBI and loses everything. This was an awesome gift for him for Father’s Day and it has room for all of his cards and cash! 💓
customer_reviews.author: TJane14

customer_reviews.title: Ideal quality gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Myself & the recipient could not be more pleased. Very nice leather, multiple cash, ID & picture areas. No doubt the quality of this leather wallet will give many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Veltri

customer_reviews.title: Will report back after a year and if it is still good I will buy another one in case this product ...
customer_reviews.text: The design of the wallet meets all my requirements (has a secure closure, holds coins, and can be attached to key rings), but had doubts of the leather quality since it's only $20. Having been using it for a week, I had no problem with it at all. Will report back after a year and if it is still good I will buy another one in case this product is discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: abokeh

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! Durable, convenient, versatile, and secure. Soft leather. If you like to be organized, and want a everyday, and weekend biker type wallet to attach a chain. great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Zilla

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends son who dropped his wallet while on his moped bike. He loves this as he is 15 and to him this was very cool!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy BB

customer_reviews.title: rite off the bat this wallet is pretty nice it has a lot of card holders and ...
customer_reviews.text: rite off the bat this wallet is pretty nice it has a lot of card holders and buttons in the inside to help keep any cards from falling out its made in Germany of real leather not bad for 20$
customer_reviews.author: Khartoum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, and he loves it. Everything fits in the wallet fine. He wishes the clasp were bigger, but he said that doesn't take away from the rating at all. So, we're both pleased!
customer_reviews.author: StayGolden

customer_reviews.title: Great wallett for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this wallet 4 stars only because the chain that comes with it is too small when it comes to the chain links. They kink too easily, and the belt loop hook is too small. I purchased a different chain separately for around $9.50. The wallet itself is well worth the $19.90 I paid for it. The leather is of good quality, and there is room for everything you want to put in it. I emptied my old wallet into this one, and still have room left over. This is not a cheap Chinese piece of junk! This wallet is German made, and the quality is apparent. Most jean pochets are 5" deep and this fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L./Buffalo, Mo.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good wallet. Chain and clip are very weak, but the nice quality soft leather material of the wallet makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler G

customer_reviews.title: The chain also broke - I work a job that is rough on clothes so I'm not too surprised but there are better chains out there for
customer_reviews.text: the spot for coins is not to my liking, there are gaps large enough the coins can get into. The chain also broke - I work a job that is rough on clothes so I'm not too surprised but there are better chains out there for sure. The places for cards and everything else about it I like though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter last Christmas. It has been over 5 months and she still loves it/uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected..I bought this for my son..He is constantly losing his wallet!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Watts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase his wallet for my husband last year Christmas gift. He loves it! so for this Christmas he wants a replacement wallet and he asked for the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: A little overrated
customer_reviews.text: While it’s certainly a decent wallet for the money, I typically find that you get what you pay for. My physically active lifestyle has worn this wallet out in about three months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WALLET
customer_reviews.text: At 1st I thought it was going to be a cheap wallet but at 2nd glance it turned out to be an awesome wallet. It has plenty of space to store your stuff. It also keeps everything secure. The chain is not much to brag about but you can always get a different chain to go with it. Shipping time was also great This wallet deserves a 5 star simply because it meets everything you need in a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY BERMUDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is just what my son wanted. He loves it! The quality is great and it is quite roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Robin K.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, RDIF PROTECTED, plus chai to belt loop
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this because he can chain to his belt loop. He has a tendency to forget or lose stuff. It is also RDIF protected. He says there is room for everything here.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Really weak chain latch
customer_reviews.text: The part of the chain that latches onto your belt loop broke after the first week. I like the wallet itself but the chain sucks
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I will never lose my wallet again thanks to this heavy duty item
customer_reviews.author: David Heaukulani

customer_reviews.title: This Wallet Could Sell For Much More !!!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is excellent and very hard to beat for the money. Great soft leather that is very supple and not one bit stiff. There is tons of room inside for cards, folding money, and even loose change. A lot of thought went into the layout of this wallet to accommodate the things you require to carry. I believe the high point of the wallet is the length. It fits completely in a standard back side pocket with nothing hanging out. Also, the craftsmanship is 100% and you will not be dissatisfied. A+A+A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Berridge

customer_reviews.title: Like the wallet so far
customer_reviews.text: Like the wallet so far. Feels very secure with the inner snap. The large bill fold section is big for US dollars, but I like the fact that I can put receipts in there and nothing sticks out. The chain was a bit weak, but I replaced it with a beefer one.
customer_reviews.author: Maly63

customer_reviews.title: Not for frequent wear. Chain is NG
customer_reviews.text: Chain is worthless. Broke in 2 days! Very soft good leather, but so soft it's ripping at the chain clasp (had to buy another chain). Snaps are more a hassle than anything. Not for frequent wear.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nikolla

customer_reviews.title: nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: It`s a bit wider than I`m used to, but easy to get used to, plenty of picture & card space. The snap is to small & light for me, replaced it & love it now. 0 complaint`s.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality leather.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality leather than what I expected made in Germany very good craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet ~ had to grind (could cut but grinder ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet ~ had to grind (could cut but grinder was handy) off the outer buckles though ~ they were annoying and prevented the wallet from slipping in and out of the pocket, and were also annoying to sit on. Once those were gone ~ very happy with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet for the price. Plenty of slots for credit, medical, ID cards. Money compartment and inside snap to secure a compartment. Two external snaps make wallet more secure. Extra long chain to secure wallet to belt loop,or around belt.
customer_reviews.author: RIC37012

customer_reviews.title: The wallet is great however there are a few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is great however there are a few drawbacks.... chain and hook are not substantial enough and needs to be replaced, wallet not quite long enough for paper money. Other than these things the wallet is great.
customer_reviews.author: Safirblu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! I bought this for my elderly dad because he kept losing his wallet. He is exstactic about the wallet and not losing his money or cards anymore , and says the wallet makes him feel super cool because of the chain! Lol! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great, if a bit biker-ey.
customer_reviews.text: If you ARE a biker or cyclist this is a wise choice. If worn properly the clip-n-chain will prevent you from being separated from your wallet and keys as well. I am able to fasten them on too. I love mine. I wonder if anyone makes a cell phone case on this principle? Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ProfHarryHill

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet !!
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet, the quality is much better than I expected. The stitching is solid and the whole wallet just feel like one I paid much more for. I am constantly loosing my wallet so I tried one with the chain and I love it.. so will you !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky
customer_reviews.text: Functional. Be aware that this wallet is VERY bulky even when it is empty. Once full of cards and cash it is unwieldy.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Holds everything and still fits in my pocket. Has a change pouch as well which is nice since most mens wallets don't have one. VERY sturdy. good leather. strong seams. takes good abuse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bulky and has 3 places for picture IDs
customer_reviews.text: Very useful as I have two forms of picture ID and this wallet has places for up to 3 picture IDs. Well made and not too bulky when everything is added to the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: I love the amount of space inside
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of space inside. Lots of ample pockets for cards and various other things. The major drawback is that the material is very thin, and therefore susceptible to moisture . Every piece of paper or paper like thing placed in the larger billfold is soggy after a day or night out:( This includes paper money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter wallet for teens
customer_reviews.text: My boys have a bad habit of losing wallets and this has so far stopped that! They seem to appreciate this new wallet with the chain helping stay on their body!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wallet with plenty of room for credit cards, bills, and even a coin pouch. Cards fit easily in the slots. Can be a little hard getting back in the back pocket as the button on the outside catch the pocket. But that is a very small observation/complaint. I would buy another again.
customer_reviews.author: OG Foto

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 91 yr old father who keeps losing his wallet. I was very impressed when it came, the leathery is nice. The design is great, lots of storage slots. The snaps are key for him, since he tends to not have a great grip on the wallet when pulls it out. They prevent all the cards etc. from falling out. Great buy for the price especially!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wallet. Love it. Very functional. Good quality, well made.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it 4 hubby
customer_reviews.text: My hubby has had it for 4 years now. It lasted that long... now its time for a new one. Love the durability!
customer_reviews.author: Naty G

customer_reviews.title: Men's Biker wallet kabana with 45 Cm long
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking wallet with a chain to keep your wallet safe from you losing it or someone trying to pickpocket you .I highly recommend getting the Men's Biker wallet Kabana with 45 Cm long.
customer_reviews.author: David Anthos

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: second purchase and i love it! good quality and plenty of compartments with zippers for great security. love the change pocket! great seller.
customer_reviews.author: bingo ringo

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: chain broke within 6 weeks of normal use, but it looks cool
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect for my husband! It has plenty of compartments and credit card slots so once he put all his stuff in he was able to fold and snap the wallet close without it being bulky. The only thing he didn't like was the chain which seemed flimsy and cheap but he was able to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, 3 id flaps, 2 billfolds
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, 3 id flaps, 2 billfolds! Love this thing! Chain is useless but I didn't want that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Bought it before. Lasted 18 months or so. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it before. Lasted 18 months or so. The new one seems opposite. I don't recall the old ones straps with the chain in this orientation. The chain is is in the wrong side when I put the straps to the outside in my back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jay VK

customer_reviews.title: Hidden pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lots of great places that you can hide your money in. Soft leather good snaps and chain
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kenneth G Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product
customer_reviews.text: You can tell it is cheaply made by the quality of leather it’s will serve its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wallet is nice with many compartments
customer_reviews.text: Ditched the chain. Wallet is nice with many compartments, money pouch was clearly designed for euros but us dollars do fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mholm

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality & no more worries of losing cards or wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Biker's Wallet. No more worries about losing any of my cards or my wallet. Great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mustard_Sword

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fell Apart...From the inside out. Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Kriegg D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice wallet, but it’s not the best quality leather. The hole where the chain hangs is already coming off. All and all it’s a nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lilduke93

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Seems to be well made. Love all the pockets and snaps to keep things secure. There is also a zippered pocket as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet for a great price. Well made and I love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Afanador

customer_reviews.title: oh well it looked cool when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: The compartments vinyl is a bit weak and will tear after a bit of use. Sometimes the cards fall out of you're not careful on keeping it in your pocket the right way. I wish I had gotten one with a zipper all the way around...oh well it looked cool when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoot The Moon

customer_reviews.title: Wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet, been using it for about 7 years now and it has really held up. I stopped using the chain a few years ago because of work related reasons. Overall the wallet is a great buy, plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Carey

customer_reviews.title: It is nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gig wear. It is nice but i wish the clasp was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak198

customer_reviews.title: Love the wallet overall
customer_reviews.text: Loving all the pockets am able to put a lot of stuff into it. Money spot is very tight as reviews of others stated but I'm getting used to it. Love the wallet overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ketera

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding does the job with plenty of room for all your wallet stuff. Have you ever lost a wallet? with this you never will. Highly recommend for anyone that does not want to lose their everything.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend in December, and 5 months later it's still holding up great! He puts a lot of bulky stuff in his wallet and so far it hasn't torn or worn down at all. The chain was very flimsy but he doesn't use that anyways so we didn't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made wallet! There are so many pockets and compartments it exceeded my expectations. Ill probably change the chain and went in to this knowing that but I loved the look of the wallet. I rather have a Belt loop rather than a lobster claw which is what it came with.
customer_reviews.author: GaryH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality material. Falls apart very fast. Really poorly made. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for holding pills as well and for guys who lose things!
customer_reviews.text: quality leather item from germany! great chain for my son who loses things. coin purse and hidden zippered area great to store medication as well!
customer_reviews.author: SonyaK

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Plenty of spots to place credit cards, license etc. also has a nice change compartment
customer_reviews.author: DagoAgent007

customer_reviews.title: Loosing items
customer_reviews.text: Love my wallet. It's keep me from loosing my personal credit card and money. And the chain keep me from loosing my wallet
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wallet, that dang chain...
customer_reviews.text: Holly cow this wallet is packed with pockets and ID card pouches! The only downsize to this wallet is the chain that comes with it, pretty cheaply made. With some modification to the chain ends I am able to make them work well (not break free from the clip/wallet).
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Utter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kid from losing his wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old son who kept losing his wallet. Works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: S G Lewiston

customer_reviews.title: Nice and OK
customer_reviews.text: It's o.k....quality is medium. Very functional but I don't expect it to last through the rigors of my 20 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: V. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This wallet rocks, the chain is a bit small ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet rocks, the chain is a bit small in the link size and will knot up on occasion, other than that I will be ordering another for future use incase I cannot find one when I have to replace the coolest wallet ever.
customer_reviews.author: jaykengle

customer_reviews.title: The wallet is very nice. I brought it as a gift and he ...
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very nice. I brought it as a gift and he liked it a lot, but there was only one problem the ring and the hook that hooks to the belt is so very small. He had to replace those, other than that he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Rae-Rae F

customer_reviews.title: Clasp that hooks to belt loop, broke immediately when ...
customer_reviews.text: Clasp that hooks to belt loop, broke immediately when I tried to attach.(Not so much break, but disintegrated. It's more a plastic than metal. The chain's whole purpose is to not loose one's wallet in a theft/fall situation, but with its stock clasp, a simple yank and it's gone.) I can't speak for the longevity of the chain itself, only that it appears to be made of a decently strong metal. So, be prepared to replace clasp hook when arrives - also, product needed to air out for a day or two as it smelled of a chemical - maybe the dye?
customer_reviews.author: MWoody

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made wallet, chain is a bit wimpy though. Holds quite a bit, is well made and the leather is smooth and thick. No problem sitting on it, although the snaps can get caught on the top of the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Clayton

customer_reviews.title: this wallet falls apart, I need something that last.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this wallet about 2 or 3 months ago and the wallet is falling apart. I am going to have to buy a new one. I shop at Amazon all the time, but this is the worst wallet I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Myers

product_meta.title: Men's Biker's Wallet Kabana with 45 Cm Long Metal Chain to Hang
product_meta.description: Men's black biker's genuine leather wallet Kabana with 45 cm long metal chain to hang
feature_bullets: Men's black biker's genuine leather wallet Kabana
With two buckles to close safe
Dimensions 4.7 x 3.5 inches (12 x 9 cm) metal chain 17.5 inches (45 cm). For the same but horizontal search for B00IMESKXK
On customer request, we have made a bit smaller one using stronger leather. Search for B0151T5SLK if interested or the same one but horizontal B01HSAQ80A
We also sell similar one made of a different leather. Search for B014ZZFLOA
